Created attachment 28313
Patch with renamed "default" variable

Issue:

The "-defaults" option of the form constructor does not work.

Demo:
set a(a) def
form form -default a
form start
form text a
form end

Does not output a '-value "def"' within html.

Reason: variable clash in constructor.
A variable "defaults" is used as interrim variable in constructor.
The same name is defined as public variable in the class.

Solution: rename one of the variables. Here, "defaults" is renamed in "callerDefaults".
Row 41:
	    upvar 1 $arguments(defaults) callerDefaults
	    array set DefaultValues [array get callerDefaults]


Warning: I don't know anything of Itcl, so a wizard should review the patch.
Eventually the new variable must be deleted or or or...

Patch is attached.
-Harald
creator: harald.oehlmann@elmicron.de

Enhanced patch to replace two times:
if {[expr ...]}
by
if {...}
which makes the expressions byte-compile-able and thus increases performance
